Channel 7 TSN 2 -> NBA: TOR vs ATL | Experience the excitement of basketball as the Toronto Raptors take on the Atlanta Hawks in an electrifying NBA game.
Channel 10 Yes TV -> Jeopardy! | Test your knowledge and quick thinking with the legendary quiz show Jeopardy! as contestants engage in intellectual challenges to win prizes and acclaim.
Channel 3 PBS Kids -> Sesame Street | Delight in educational and entertaining stories featuring beloved characters as they teach valuable lessons through songs, puppetry, and animation.
Channel 6 TSN 1 -> NHL: MTL vs PHI | Witness intense ice hockey action as the Montreal Canadiens face off against the Philadelphia Flyers in a thrilling NHL matchup.
Channel 8 Sportsnet -> NHL: DET vs COL | Tune in to catch the Detroit Red Wings battling the Colorado Avalanche in a high-stakes NHL ice hockey showdown.
Channel 9 National Geographic -> Wildlife: Resurrection Island | Explore the mesmerizing ecosystem of Resurrection Island, where wildlife thrives and unfolds its captivating stories in the heart of nature.
Channel 1 CBC -> CBC News | Stay informed with the latest breaking news, in-depth analysis, and investigative reports from around the world on CBC News.
Channel 2 CTV -> Big Bang Theory | Join a group of quirky scientists and their humorous adventures as they navigate life, love, and the complexities of the universe in this popular sitcom.
Channel 5 Food Network -> Jamie Oliver | Embark on a culinary journey with renowned chef Jamie Oliver as he shares delicious recipes, cooking tips, and food inspiration.
Channel 4 BBC -> BBC News | Get a global perspective on current events, politics, and culture through comprehensive reporting, interviews, and analysis on BBC News.
